Verses: 1 andriyum Sagodharare, Makkedhoniyaa Naattu Sabaigalukku Devan Aliththa Kirubaiyai Ungalukku Arivikkirom.
2 avargal Migundha Ubaththiravaththinaale Sothikkappadugaiyil, Kodiya Thariththiramudaiyavargalaayirundhum, Thangal Paripoorana Santhoshaththinaale Migundha Udhaaraththuvamaaik Koduththaargal.
3 melum Avargal Thangal Thiraanikkuth Thakkadhaagavum, Thangal Thiraanikku Minjiyum Kodukka Thaangale Manadhullavargalaayirundhaargalenpadharku, Naan Saatchiyaayirukkiren.
4 thangal Ubagaaraththaiyum, Parisuththavaangalukku Seyyappadum Dharmaoozhiyaththin Pangaiyum Naangal Etrukkollumpadi Avargal Engalai Migavum Vendikkondaargal.
5 melum Naangal Ninaiththapadimaaththiram Kodaamal, Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Munbu Thangalaiththaame Karththarukkum, Pinbu Engalukkum Oppukkoduththaargal.
6 aadhalaal Theeththu Indhath Tharmakaariyaththai Ungalidaththil Thodanginapadiye, Adhai Mudikkavum Vendumendru Avanaik Kettukkondom.

7 allaamalum, Visuvaasaththilum, Podhippilum, Arivilum, Ellaavidha Jaakkiradhaiyilum, Engalmelulla Ungal Anbilum, Matrellaak Kaariyangalilum, Neengal Perugiyirukkiradhupola, Indhath Tharmakaariyaththilum Perugavendum.
8 idhai Naan Kattalaiyaaga Sollaamal, Matravargaludaiya Jaakkiradhaiyaikkondu, Ungal Anbin Unmaiyai Sodhikkumporutte Sollugiren.

9 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Kirubaiyai Arindhirukkireergale; Avar Aisuvariyamullavaraayirundhum, Neengal Avarudaiya Thariththiraththinaale Aisuvariyavaangalaagumpadikku, Ungalnimiththam Thariththiraraanaare.

10 idhaikkuriththu En Yosanaiyai Ungalukku Arivikkiren; Idhai Seygiradharku Maaththiramalla, Seyyavendumendru Urchaagappadugiradharkum Oruvarushamaai Aarambampannina Ungalukku Idhu Thagudhiyaayirukkum.
11 aagaiyaal Adhai Ippozhudhu Seydhu Niraivetrungal; Kodukkavendum Engira Viruppamundaayirundhadhupola, Ungalukku Ullavaigalil Eduththu Adhai Niraivetrudhalum Undaavadhaaga.
12 oruvanukku Manaviruppamirundhaal, Avanukku Illaadhadhinpadiyalla, Avanukku Ulladhinpadiye Angikarikkappadum.
13 matravargalukku Sagaayamum Ungalukku Varuththamum Undaagumpadiyalla, Samanilaiyirukkumpadiyaagave Sollugiren.
14 eppadiyenil, Migudhiyaai Serththavanukku Adhigamaanadhumillai, Konjamaai Serththavanukkuk Kuraivaanadhumillai Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapiragaaram,
15 samanilaip Piramaanaththinpadiye, Avargaludaiya Selvam Ungal Varumaikku Udhavumpadikku Ikkaalaththile Ungaludaiya Selvam Avargaludaiya Varumaikku Udhavuvadhaaga.
16 andriyum Ungalukkaaga Ippadippatta Jaakkiradhai Undaayirukkumpadi Theeththuvin Irudhayaththil Arulina Dhevanukku Sthoththiram.
17 naangal Kettukkondadhai Avan Angikariththadhumallaamal, Avan Adhiga Jaakkiradhaiyaayirundhu, Than Viruppaththinpadiye Ungalidaththirku Varap Purappattaan.
18 suvisesha Oozhiyaththil Ellaa Sabaigalilum Pugazhchchipetra Oru Sagodharanai Avanodekooda Anuppiyirukkirom.

19 adhumaaththiramalla, Karththarukku Magimaiyundaagavum, Ungal Manaviruppam Vilangavum, Engal Oozhiyaththinaale Serkkappadum Tharmappanaththaik Kondupogaiyil, Engalukku Vazhiththunaiyaayirukkumpadi, Avan Sabaigalaal Therindhu Erpaduththappattavanaayum Irukkiraan.
20 engal Oozhiyaththinaale Serkkappadum Indha Migudhiyaana Tharmappanaththaikkuriththu Oruvanum Engalaik Kutrappaduththaadhapadikku Naangal Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu,
21 karththarukku Munbaagamaaththiramalla, Manusharukku Munbaagavum Yokkiyamaanavaigalai Seyya Naadugirom.

22 melum, Anega Kaariyangalil Jaakkiradhaiyullavanendru Naangal Palamurai Kandarindhavanum, Ippozhudhu Ungalmelulla Migundha Nambikkaiyinaale Adhiga Jaakkiradhaiyullavanumaagiya Nammudaiya Sagodharanaiyum Ivargalode Kooda Anuppiyirukkirom.

23 theeththuvaikkuriththu Oruvan Visaariththaal, Avan Enakkuk Koottaaliyum Ungalukkaaga En Udanvelaiyaalumaayikkiraanendrum; Engal Sagodhararaikkuriththu Oruvan Visaariththaal, Avargal Sabaigaludaiya Sthaanaapadhigalum, Kiristhuvukku Magimaiyumaayirukkiraargalendrum Ariyakkadavan.
24 aadhalaal Ungal Anbaiyum, Naangal Ungalaikkuriththu Sonna Pugazhchchiyaiyum, Sabaigalukku Munbaaga Avargalukkuth Thirushtaandhappaduththungal.
